Harlow Skin Co. Tinted Moisturizer, 04

Brand: Harlow

Category: BB Cream

Category: BB Cream

Ingredients: Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia) Seed Oil**, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil**, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Seed Oil, Salvia Sclarea (Clary Sage) Oil*, Citrus Grandis (Pink Grapefruit) Peel Oil*, Kaolin Clay, Non Nano Zinc Oxide, Iron Oxides (CP81002, CP81004, CP88002)
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
